features: Lightweight comfort: With a heathered front, wide shoulders, mesh back and regular fit, this tank is soft, lightweight and easy to wear
Moisture management: AdvancedSkin ActiveDry technology wicks moisture away, while the mesh back makes the tank really breathable even with a rucksack
Outdoor versatile: With a flattering cut and minimalist design, you can wear this tank all summer from the mountain top to city center
Active fit: On tops and bottoms, Active fit is close fitting and lets you move. Not too tight, not too loose
AdvancedSkin ActiveDry: AdvancedSkin technical fabrics improve body comfort by keeping you dry, warm and protected when you need it and where you need it
Breathable mesh: High quality lining with high breathability and fast moisture transport
